You know how we say you can build anything with Salesforce?  The trial you're using is managed with Salesforce.

Trial Activities
A single record that shows your path selections and some of the information you provided at the beginning.

Path Activities
Steps that are presented in the Current task area, including help animations, trailhead content, and tests for when you've completed them successfully.

Path Activities are assigned based what you said you're interested in.
 
Walkthroughs
Exist as a child object of the Path Activities.  You can see which walkthroughs are presented with each step.
